alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:43PM CDT until July 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL TIPPAH...NORTHERN BENTON AND WESTERN ALCORN COUNTIES... At 242 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canaan, or 15 miles northwest of Ripley, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Theo, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Chalybeate, Murry, Brody, Collinstown, Crumtown, New Canaan, Brownfield, Lone Pine, Whitten Town, Hamilton, Peoples and Tiplersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
